|description  = A new fishing aid developed by Delaroche that applies the principles of odor analysis and advanced bait mimicry. It is said that its effect is "very powerful." '''"Active Odor Imitating Bait"''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Delaroche's Bait]]''.
